Amazon is a great place to practice science and have real business impact with publications. Amazon scientists continue to publish papers, teach, and engage with the worldwide research community.

We’re always coming up with ideas for new products and services, but every idea needs to be researched to know if it will improve the lives of our customers. This is where our research scientists come in – to dive deep and help us learn.

At Amazon, we believe that scientific innovation is essential to being the most customer-centric company in the world. Our scientists' ability to have an impact at scale allows us to attract some of the brightest minds in artificial intelligence and related fields.
